topic.title: What's about PlayAnime?
topic.body: Did the funder of PlayAnime dropped the project? Is he having legal issues? (I do not think so but why not... it may happen) or did he drop the project for other reasons?

1_1LiBAqfmPSAEhoFj2fM3iMEZe5uzZnSUse.body:
They finally decided to authorize some pornographic content on their plateform.

https://www.pcgamer.com/steams-first-uncensored-adult-game-has-been-approved/
